title: Samses
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Western, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European
description: One of the more vegan friendly eats in Zurich. Choose between buffet (pay per weight) and a la carte. There are tofu dishes, vegan soya schnitzel, vegan burger, Asian dishes, and vegan dessert. Around 80% of the items are vegan suitable and labeled. Pasta served in evening.
